translation.en: [narrator] Four turtles…
translation.zh: 有四只乌龟

translation.en: four brothers…
translation.zh: 他们是四兄弟

translation.en: genetically reborn in the sewers of New York.
translation.zh: 基因突变后在纽约的下水道里重生

translation.en: Named after the great Renaissance masters…
translation.zh: 以文艺复兴时期的大师为名

translation.en: and trained as ninjas.
translation.zh: 接受忍者修行

translation.en: They battled many creatures and foes
translation.zh: 他们一路打击无数邪恶力量

translation.en: before defeating their arch-enemy,  the Shredder.
translation.zh: 最终战胜了大敌施莱德

translation.en: But now, a greater evil is poised  to destroy their very brotherhood.
translation.zh: 但一股更强大的邪恶力量正准备摧毁他们的兄弟情谊

translation.en: An evil born 3,000 years ago.
translation.zh: 这股邪恶力量诞生于3000年前

translation.en: It was in that time that a warrior king named Yoatl
translation.zh: 在那个时候 一位名叫优特的勇士国王带领着他的战士

translation.en: led a brotherhood that fought side by side with one purpose.
translation.zh: 一位名叫优特的勇士国王带领着他的战士 并肩作战只为一个目的

translation.en: To conquer all the kingdoms of the world.
translation.zh: 征服全世界

translation.en: Nothing could stand in their way,
translation.zh: 他们一路所向披靡

translation.en: as they left a trail of destruction behind them.
translation.zh: 摧枯拉朽

translation.en: In his quest, the warrior learned of a constellation
translation.zh: 在征战中战士了解到一个

translation.en: known as the Stars of Kicaan.
translation.zh: 被称作基肯星系的地方

translation.en: Every 3,000 years, the stars would align…
translation.zh: 每隔3000年群星便会连成一线

translation.en: opening a portal to a world of unknown power.
translation.zh: 开启一个通往未知力量世界的传送门

translation.en: He became immortal,  but at a price.
translation.zh: 他得到了永生 但也付出了代价

translation.en: His brotherhood was turned to stone.
translation.zh: 他的兄弟们变成了石头

translation.en: And upon the portal's opening,
translation.zh: 而且在这传送门开启之后

translation.en: 13 monsters were released into our world.
translation.zh: 13只怪物窜进了我们的世界

translation.en: The warrior king was left to eternally walk the Earth…
translation.zh: 国王困于地球永世行走

translation.en: unable to die or forget his horrible mistake.
translation.zh: 无法死去 亦无法忘却自己的罪过

translation.en: And the monsters that were unleashed
translation.zh: 而那些怪物直至今日依旧

translation.en: continue to plague mankind to this very day.
translation.zh: 在不断地威胁着人类

translation.en: -[woman] Monsters. -[man chuckles]
translation.zh: 怪物！

translation.en: No.
translation.zh: 不！

translation.en: We appreciate the generous donation
translation.zh: 非常感谢各位为保护村庄

translation.en: for the continued protection of your village.
translation.zh: 而如此慷慨大方

translation.en: After all, the jungle can be a very dangerous place.
translation.zh: 毕竟丛林可是非常危险啊

translation.en: -Mama! -[man] Oh, she is dangerous.
translation.zh: 妈妈！ 真麻烦

translation.en: There's monsters out there.
translation.zh: 怪物来了

translation.en: [curses in Spanish] Watch where you're going.
translation.zh: 蠢货 能不能好好开车

translation.en: There's a log on the road, senor.
translation.zh: 有树挡在了路中间 老大

translation.en: Well, if you're not too busy, remove it!
translation.zh: 那你们还等着做什么 快去搬开！

translation.en: Cortez, andale.
translation.zh: 柯蒂斯 你去

translation.en: Dios mio.
translation.zh: 老天

translation.en: Who are you? Show yourself.
translation.zh: 谁？快点现身

translation.en: [driver] The Ghost of the Jungle.
translation.zh: 丛林里的幽灵

translation.en: He punishes those who prey upon the weak.
translation.zh: 他会惩罚那些欺凌弱小的人

translation.en: He's coming.
translation.zh: 他要来了！

translation.en: I just remembered I left the stove on. My wife, she hates that!
translation.zh: 我刚想起来我没关炉子要是我老婆发现一定会生气！

translation.en: -Coward. Get back here. -You're on your own, jefe.
translation.zh: 胆小鬼 回来！ 你得靠自己了 老大

translation.en: Show yourself. Do you realize who you're dealing with?
translation.zh: 给我出来 你知道自己招惹了谁吗？

translation.en: What is this? What?
translation.zh: 什么啊？

translation.en: I am not afraid of a myth.
translation.zh: 我才不怕什么传说

translation.en: I'm not afraid of a ghost.
translation.zh: 幽灵我也不怕！

translation.en: What are you?
translation.zh: 你是谁？

translation.en: [gasps] It's a miracle.
translation.zh: 真是个奇迹

translation.en: The Ghost of the Jungle.
translation.zh: 丛林里的幽灵

translation.en: There. That's where I saw him.
translation.zh: 我就是在那儿看到的他

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢你

translation.en: You'd better get home now.
translation.zh: 你现在该回家了

translation.en: Do you know the ghost?
translation.zh: 你认识幽灵吗？

translation.en: He wasn't always a ghost.
translation.zh: 他不是幽灵

translation.en: Hello?
translation.zh: 有人在吗？

translation.en: Is anyone here?
translation.zh: 有人在吗？

translation.en: Hello?
translation.zh: 有人在吗？

translation.en: [Leonardo] It's a long way from the city to just drop in.
translation.zh: 小心点 这里可不是什么大城市

translation.en: Leo.
translation.zh: 里奥

translation.en: You came all the way down here to look for me?
translation.zh: 你跑这么远就是为了找我？

translation.en: Actually, I was already here on business.
translation.zh: 事实上我来这里有正事

translation.en: But then the local legend started sounding familiar,
translation.zh: 但感觉这里的传说听起来很耳熟

translation.en: so I decided to snoop around.
translation.zh: 所以决定过来看看

translation.en: What kind of business?
translation.zh: 是什么正事？

translation.en: Ancient artifacts.
translation.zh: 古文物

translation.en: Some tycoon with too much time on his hands
translation.zh: 某个大富豪闲得不行

translation.en: has his heart set on a collection of 3000-year-old statues.
translation.zh: 一心想要收藏3000年前的石雕

translation.en: Well, you always did run with a strange crowd, April.
translation.zh: 你总是跟怪人打交道 爱普莉尔

translation.en: Yeah, well. Our strange crowd
translation.zh: 现在这些人少了你

translation.en: hasn't been the same without you.
translation.zh: 感觉都不一样了

translation.en: Things aren't looking so good back home.
translation.zh: 最近情况不太妙

translation.en: [sighs] How bad could it be?
translation.zh: 能有多糟？

translation.en: Donnie's probably got everything under control.
translation.zh: 多尼应该一切尽在把握吧

translation.en: -Sir? Sir. Sir. -[man chattering]
translation.zh: 先生？先生 （多纳泰罗）

translation.en: Did you turn the computer on? Have you plugged it in?
translation.zh: 你开电脑了吗？ 有插电源吗？

translation.en: Yeah, that would help.
translation.zh: 没错 那会有用的

translation.en: No, I'm not playing hard to get.
translation.zh: 不 我没有在装样子

translation.en: I'm telling you, sir, it's not that kind of phone line.
translation.zh: 先生 我说了这不是那种电话

translation.en: I'm not your enemy. I'm just Donnie,
translation.zh: 我不是你的敌人 我只是多尼

translation.en: your friendly IT tech support, here to help you 24 hours a day, sir.
translation.zh: 一名友好的IT技术支持人员24小时为您服务 先生

translation.en: Yeah, I'm sorry. Ma'am. [chuckles nervously]
translation.zh: 很抱歉 小姐

translation.en: But Donnie's a genius.
translation.zh: 但多尼是个天才

translation.en: Why would he take a job like that?
translation.zh: 他为什么要接受那样的工作？

translation.en: At least he's keeping busy.
translation.zh: 至少他还有在忙

translation.en: Well, if he's doing that, who's keeping an eye on Mikey?
translation.zh: 好吧 那他这么忙的话谁在照看米开？

translation.en: [April] Mike's gotten into the, um, entertainment business.
translation.zh: 米开进了娱乐圈

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: （米开朗基罗） 好耶！卡哇邦嘎 祝你生日快乐

translation.en: Happy birthday from Cowabunga Carl.
translation.zh: 好耶！卡哇邦嘎 祝你生日快乐

translation.en: Take it easy, little dudes. I bruise easily.
translation.zh: 小家伙们 轻点啊 很容易受伤的

translation.en: Hey, black-and-blue clashes with green, dudes. Hey, that's… [groans]
translation.zh: 会有淤青啊 伙计们 嘿 过分了啊

translation.en: He's a big hit.
translation.zh: 他很受欢迎呢

translation.en: All right. Let's hear it. What's Raph doing?
translation.zh: 好吧 继续说 拉斐尔在做些什么？

translation.en: No one really knows. He just sleeps all day.
translation.zh: 没人知道 他白天都在睡觉

translation.en: Well, what's he do all night?
translation.zh: 那他晚上在做什么？

translation.en: POLICE[man] 2802, 2802, burglary in progress at 55th and Broadway.
translation.zh: （拉斐尔） 2802 55街和百老汇街街口发生入室盗窃

translation.en: Suspects considered armed and dangerous.
translation.zh: 嫌犯持有武器十分危险

translation.en: [Raphael] Time to punch in.
translation.zh: 该我出马了

translation.en: Good work, boys. That was easier than I thought it was gonna be.
translation.zh: 干得好 伙计们 这比我想得还简单

translation.en: Hey, look, guys. I grabbed a toaster.
translation.zh: 看啊 兄弟们 我弄到一个烤面包机

translation.en: I love your work ethic, Tommy. It's an inspiration to us all.
translation.zh: 我很喜欢你的职业素养 汤米 简直鼓舞了我们所有人

translation.en: -What was that? -Huh?
translation.zh: 那是什么声音？

translation.en: What's going on, guys?
translation.zh: 怎么回事 伙计们？

translation.en: What in the… Ow!
translation.zh: 到底…

translation.en: Looks like it's just you and me, shaky.
translation.zh: 看来只剩你跟我了

translation.en: Take it easy. I'm not gonna hurt you…
translation.zh: 别紧张 我不会让你受伤…

translation.en: much.
translation.zh: 太严重

translation.en: I love when they play hard to get.
translation.zh: 我喜欢玩我追你跑

translation.en: The Nightwatcher.
translation.zh: 是守夜人

translation.en: -He's doing our job for us again. -Tommy…
translation.zh: 他又在帮我们干活了

translation.en: -Keep your hands to yourself. -Hey, who's tickling me?
translation.zh: 汤米 把你的手拿开 嘿 谁在挠我？

translation.en: Your training period ended a year ago.
translation.zh: 你的修行一年前就该结束了

translation.en: And Splinter says you don't write anymore.
translation.zh: 斯普林特也说好久没收到你的信了

translation.en: Splinter sent me down here to become a better leader.
translation.zh: 斯普林特让我来这里是为了让我成为更好的队长

translation.en: I can't go back a failure.
translation.zh: 在成功之前我不能回去

translation.en: Besides, these people need me more than my brothers do.
translation.zh: 而且这里的人民比我的兄弟更需要我

translation.en: If Master Splinter were here,
translation.zh: 如果斯普林特大师在这里他就会问你

translation.en: he would ask you, "What is your heart telling you?"
translation.zh: 如果斯普林特大师在这里他就会问你 “你内心真实的想法是什么？”

translation.en: I don't know. I just know something's missing.
translation.zh: 我不知道 我只感觉少了些什么

translation.en: Your brothers need you, Leo.
translation.zh: 你的兄弟需要你 里奥

translation.en: They're lost without you.
translation.zh: 没有你 他们都变样了

translation.en: Leo?
translation.zh: 里奥！

translation.en: Why skate a halfpipe when you can skate a sewer pipe?
translation.zh: 可以滑下水管道为什么还要滑U型管道？

translation.en: Sewer's up, brah.
translation.zh: 疯狂下水道

translation.en: Ho-ho! Cowabunga!
translation.zh: 卡哇邦嘎！

translation.en: [distorted] Dude. [normal voice] Going down.
translation.zh: 伙计 下去咯

translation.en: Here's Mikey.
translation.zh: 米开来了

translation.en: Guys? Anyone?
translation.zh: 伙计们？有谁在吗？

translation.en: Hello?
translation.zh: 有人吗？

translation.en: [sighs] Whatever.
translation.zh: 算了

translation.en: This place used to be fun.
translation.zh: （请插入） 这里以前可有意思多了

translation.en: [newscaster] And with rocketing interest rates,
translation.zh: （房地产） 利率一路飙升

translation.en: that's bad news for homeowners
translation.zh: 这对房主来说是个坏消息因为房地产市场…

translation.en: as the real-estate market continues its downward spiral.
translation.zh: 这对房主来说是个坏消息因为房地产市场… 在继续螺旋式下滑

translation.en: Coming up, the vigilante known as Nightwatcher strikes again.
translation.zh: 下一条新闻 被称为“守夜人”的义务警员再次出击

translation.en: [man] Now, I can't say for sure, but he was definitely an alien.
translation.zh: 我不敢说一定 但他绝对是个外星人

translation.en: [woman] I think it's a disgrace, taking the law into your own hands like that.
translation.zh: 我认为这是一种耻辱 任由民间人士滥用私法

translation.en: -Leave it to the police. -[newscaster] Up next…
translation.zh: -把活儿留给警察吧！-下一条新闻

translation.en: I remember how that used to feel,
translation.zh: 我记得那种感觉

translation.en: busting up crime syndicates.
translation.zh: 打垮犯罪集团

translation.en: Sure, they had a bunch of guns,
translation.zh: 当然了 他们会有很多枪

translation.en: but they weren't like these guns. [grunts]
translation.zh: 但他们人不如枪

translation.en: Why do you do this to yourself, Mikey?
translation.zh: 为什么要这样 米开？

translation.en: Those glory days are over.
translation.zh: 那些辉煌已经结束了

translation.en: Forget about 'em. Get on with your life.
translation.zh: 忘了吧 过好自己的生活

translation.en: Concentrate on your work.
translation.zh: 专注工作

translation.en: Yeah, yeah. Spoken like a true has-been.
translation.zh: 是啊 说得就像个老头子

translation.en: Well, look who woke up.
translation.zh: 看看是谁醒了

translation.en: I suppose you think the Nightwatcher is some kind of hero.
translation.zh: 我猜你认为守夜人是某种英雄

translation.en: Beats sitting around doing nothing while dirtbags run free.
translation.zh: 总比什么都不做任由恶人四处乱窜强

translation.en: I would love to know what it is that you do that's so great.
translation.zh: 我很想知道你到底做了什么了不起的事

translation.en: At least we're contributing around here. All you do is sleep all day.
translation.zh: 至少我们在为这里做贡献 而你整天都在睡觉

translation.en: Yeah, I do nothing. You're right.
translation.zh: 是啊 我无所事事 你说得对

translation.en: You got me all figured out.
translation.zh: 你真是看透我了

translation.en: I know that your attitude has always been
translation.zh: 我一直知道你的恶劣态度

translation.en: a source of contention to this team.
translation.zh: 就是我们小队争吵的根源

translation.en: You think fear is the best way to accomplish things, but you're wrong.
translation.zh: 就是我们小队争吵的根源 你觉得吓唬人是个好办法但你是大错特错了

translation.en: First of all, this team you speak of doesn't exist anymore.
translation.zh: 首先 你说的小队已经不存在了

translation.en: And second of all… [grunts]
translation.zh: 其次

translation.en: [Splinter] Raphael.
translation.zh: 拉斐尔

translation.en: Enough.
translation.zh: 够了

translation.en: [chuckles] I think I made my point.
translation.zh: 我想我已经说得很清楚了

translation.en: That doesn't prove anything.
translation.zh: 这证明不了什么

translation.en: Why couldn't you send him away for training?
translation.zh: 你为什么不送他去修行呢？

translation.en: Donatello, this home has become like an empty shell.
translation.zh: 多纳泰罗这个家已经变成了一个空壳

translation.en: Each of your brothers has strengths and weaknesses.
translation.zh: 你们每个兄弟都有长处和短处

translation.en: You must learn to be strong when they are weak.
translation.zh: 在他们有所不足时你必须学着顶上

translation.en: If you don't learn to recognize this,
translation.zh: 如果你无法参透这一点

translation.en: then all hope is lost for our family.
translation.zh: 那最后这个家就没有希望了

translation.en: [man] Keep it coming.
translation.zh: 继续

translation.en: [April] Hey, careful.
translation.zh: 嘿 小心点

translation.en: Those aren't souvenirs.
translation.zh: 那些可不是纪念品

translation.en: [man] Ah. Sorry about that, ma'am.
translation.zh: 抱歉了 小姐 （奥尼尔货物）

translation.en: Where are you, Casey?
translation.zh: 你在哪儿啊 凯西？

translation.en: -[cell phone ringing] -Come on. Come on, pick up.
translation.zh: 拜托 快接电话啊

translation.en: Don't do this to me again. Not now.
translation.zh: 别又来这一套啊

translation.en: Casey can't come to the phone right now
translation.zh: 凯西现在不方便接电话

translation.en: 'cause we're hardly working.
translation.zh: 因为我们很少工作

translation.en: [groans] This better be good.
translation.zh: 最好是有啥好事情

translation.en: [April] Casey, I am standing on the dock
translation.zh: 凯西 我现在在码头

translation.en: with a priceless statue and no delivery truck.
translation.zh: 守着一个价值连城的雕像但货车的影子都没见着

translation.en: -So my question is, where are you? -April.
translation.zh: 所以你在哪儿？ 爱普莉尔

translation.en: Hey, babe. I am so sorry. I set the alarm clock, but…
translation.zh: 宝贝 我很抱歉 我定了闹钟 但是…

translation.en: It's broken. The clock…
translation.zh: 它坏了 钟坏了

translation.en: It's bad enough that you're out every night playing vigilante,
translation.zh: 你每晚出去当治安维持者已经够糟了

translation.en: but we've got a deadline to meet.
translation.zh: 但工作是有时限的

translation.en: [sighs] I'm sorry.
translation.zh: 我很抱歉

translation.en: Oh, wait, babe, real quick.
translation.zh: 等下 宝贝 很快就好

translation.en: You left a message saying you found Leo.
translation.zh: 你发信息说你找到里奥了

translation.en: -I mean, is he there with you? -No.
translation.zh: 他和你在一起吗？ 没有

translation.en: I found him. He's not coming back.
translation.zh: 我是找到他了 但他不打算回来

translation.en: But… But didn't you tell him how weird things have gotten with the Turtles?
translation.zh: 你没告诉他乌龟兄弟们现在状态很奇怪吗？

translation.en: Look, Casey, we're gonna lose the biggest client we have
translation.zh: 凯西你听着 如果你再不过来

translation.en: if you don't get down here.
translation.zh: 我们就要丢掉大客户了

translation.en: All right. I'm on my way.
translation.zh: 好吧 我马上来

translation.en: Please tell me we're getting paid by the pound here.
translation.zh: 请告诉我这次是按重量收费

translation.en: Is this place a museum or what?
translation.zh: 这地方是什么博物馆吗？

translation.en: You've never heard of WintersCorp?
translation.zh: 你是说你没听说过温特斯企业？

translation.en: That's what I'm telling you.
translation.zh: 我就是这个意思

translation.en: They're into everything, real estate,
translation.zh: 他们什么都有涉足 房地产

translation.en: technology, pharmaceuticals, hair gel.
translation.zh: 科技 药品 发胶

translation.en: -[Casey] I don't wear hair gel. -[April] Really?
translation.zh: -我不用发胶-真的吗？

translation.en: [Casey] I'm the caveman type, au naturel.
translation.zh: 我是崇尚自然派

translation.en: Just make sure you don't touch anything in here.
translation.zh: 别碰到这里的任何东西

translation.en: Hey, I was born careful.
translation.zh: 嘿 我一直都很小心

translation.en: -Hope that wasn't expensive. -[alarm blaring]
translation.zh: 希望那不要太贵

translation.en: Oh, wait… Just… I'm…
translation.zh: 等等 我只是…

translation.en: -Oh, boy. -Please tell me that wasn't you.
translation.zh: 糟糕 请告诉我不是你弄的

translation.en: -[April] Mr. Winters. -Miss O'Neil.
translation.zh: -温特斯先生-奥尼尔小姐

translation.en: All the pieces are coming together.
translation.zh: 最后一块拼图终于到了

translation.en: Oh, my. This is my associate, Casey.
translation.zh: 天啊 这是我的助理凯西

translation.en: -Nice to meet you, Kenny. -Boyfriend. It's Casey.
translation.zh: -很高兴认识你 肯尼-是男朋友 我叫凯西

translation.en: So you were successful?
translation.zh: 成功到手了吗？

translation.en: Yes. The fourth general.
translation.zh: 是的 第四个将军

translation.en: I want to ask you before I go,
translation.zh: 但在离开之前我有一个请求

translation.en: if I could take one last look?
translation.zh: 我能最后再看一眼吗？

translation.en: I believe this is the one they call General Akeela?
translation.zh: 我想这个应该就是阿奇拉将军吧？

translation.en: [Winters] It's actually "Aguila," but that was a good try.
translation.zh: 实际上是阿吉拉 但也差不多了

translation.en: These statues may appear to be only stone,
translation.zh: 这些雕像可能看起来只是石头

translation.en: but they're like family to me.
translation.zh: 但他们对我而言就是家人

translation.en: I didn't choose them.
translation.zh: 他们不是我的选择

translation.en: Friends you can choose, but never your family.
translation.zh: 你可以选择朋友 但你不能选择家人

translation.en: Okay, then.
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: Take care, Mr. Winters.
translation.zh: 保重 温特斯先生

translation.en: If you've come to kill me, could you make it fast?
translation.zh: 要是想来杀我能不能搞快点？

translation.en: I've got a shareholders' meeting at 10:00.
translation.zh: 10点钟我还有个董事会要开

translation.en: I'd rather miss it.
translation.zh: 虽然我并不想去

translation.en: If we had come here to hurt you, you'd be hurting already.
translation.zh: 如果我们是来害你的 那你现在就该受伤了

translation.en: The Foot Clan and I have come to hear your offer.
translation.zh: 大脚帮和我只是来看看你想要什么

translation.en: Well, it appears that today is my lucky day.
translation.zh: 今天真是我的幸运日啊

translation.en: I must warn you, we do not come cheap.
translation.zh: 先提醒你 我们的费用不低

translation.en: Does it look like money is of any concern to me?
translation.zh: 我看起来像是会在乎钱的人吗？

translation.en: Only time is of the essence, my dear.
translation.zh: 时间才最重要 亲爱的

translation.en: Since you're so rich and powerful,
translation.zh: 既然你如此有钱有势

translation.en: what is it we could possibly have to offer you?
translation.zh: 我们能为你做什么？

translation.en: I need you to be my eyes and ears.
translation.zh: 我需要你们做我的耳目

translation.en: I have some friends coming to town
translation.zh: 最近有些朋友要来

translation.en: that I'd like to roll out the red carpet for.
translation.zh: 我想要欢迎他们一下

translation.en: Greet them warmly and bring them to me.
translation.zh: 热情迎接他们 带他们到我这里来

translation.en: And how will we know these friends?
translation.zh: 我们要怎么辨别你的朋友们？

translation.en: [Winters] Don't worry, they're impossible to miss.
translation.zh: 别担心 见到你就知道了

translation.en: And you keep them up. Got that?
translation.zh: 不准把手放下来 明白？

translation.en: And don't let me catch you calling the cops.
translation.zh: 别让我抓到你们报警

translation.en: [gasps] What? Not again.
translation.zh: 什么？又来

translation.en: Didn't I take care of you last week?
translation.zh: 我上周不是刚收拾过你？

translation.en: Hey. Oh, no. Come on, now. Wait.
translation.zh: 拜托 不要 等一下

translation.en: I'm very disappointed in you, knucklehead.
translation.zh: 我对你很失望啊 傻大个

translation.en: -Guess night school's in session. -[Casey whistles]
translation.zh: 看来还得再给你上一课才行

translation.en: Hope I'm not disturbing class.
translation.zh: 希望我没有打扰你们上课

translation.en: Hey, Nightwatcher, need any teaching assistants?
translation.zh: 嘿 守夜人 需要助教吗？

translation.en: [Nightwatcher] [softly] Oh, no. Casey.
translation.zh: 糟糕 是凯西

translation.en: [clears throat] I got this one covered, pal. Thanks, but no, thanks.
translation.zh: 这家伙我一个人就够了 伙计 谢了 但不用你插手

translation.en: You think you own these rooftops?
translation.zh: 当这屋顶是你的地盘吗？

translation.en: I happen to think you could use my help.
translation.zh: 我想你会需要我的帮助

translation.en: And I could use a sidekick.
translation.zh: 而我多个伙伴也不错

translation.en: You may have everyone else fooled, but you haven't fooled me, Raph.
translation.zh: 也许你能瞒过其他所有人但你瞒不过我 拉斐

translation.en: Yeah, well, guess what, pal. Now you…
translation.zh: 你猜怎么着 伙计

translation.en: Hey, wait a minute. How did you know it was me?
translation.zh: 嘿 等一下 你怎么知道是我？

translation.en: Wasn't that hard, man. You know, you look like a big, metal turtle.
translation.zh: 也不难猜 你看起来就像个金属大乌龟

translation.en: [groans] It's that obvious, huh?
translation.zh: 有那么明显吗？

translation.en: [man panting] I should've stayed in law school.
translation.zh: 我就应该留在法学院

translation.en: [Casey] Oh, ain't that cute? He's trying to get away.
translation.zh: 真可爱 不是吗？他还想跑呢

translation.en: [Casey] Well, looks like I got a sidekick.
translation.zh: 看来我有个同伴了

translation.en: [Nightwatcher] Yeah, right. You're the sidekick.
translation.zh: 没错 你就是同伴

translation.en: [man] What, is it performance art? I don't get it.
translation.zh: 那是行为艺术吗？

translation.en: [Raphael] What was I supposed to do?
translation.zh: 那我该怎么做？干坐着

translation.en: Sit around, wait for Leo to come back and save the day?
translation.zh: 那我该怎么做？干坐着 等里奥回来再拯救世界？

translation.en: I mean, we haven't heard one word from him
translation.zh: 自从斯普林特大师送他去受训后

translation.en: since Splinter sent him away on his little vacation.
translation.zh: 他连一个字都没给我们过

translation.en: Come on, you think these lowlifes take vacations at the first sign of pressure?
translation.zh: 拜托 你以为这些人渣 有压力会去度假吗？

translation.en: No. The criminal element of this city may be guilty of a lot of things
translation.zh: 不会 这个城市的犯罪分子 犯下了很多罪行

translation.en: but being quitters ain't one of them.
translation.zh: 但半途而废不是其中一条

translation.en: You know, I don't even care about Leo anymore.
translation.zh: 我现在根本不在乎什么里奥

translation.en: Kind of hope he never comes back.
translation.zh: 甚至希望他别回来了

translation.en: Come on, aren't you being a little hard on the guy?
translation.zh: 拜托 会不会有点太绝情了？

translation.en: I don't know. It's possible.
translation.zh: 不知道 有可能吧

translation.en: I guess if I could live anywhere other than the city, I'd go too.
translation.zh: 我想如果我可以住在其他地方我也一样会去的

translation.en: But I could never leave this place.
translation.zh: 但我永远无法离开这里

translation.en: I can't even sleep without the sound of the subway rumbling over my head.
translation.zh: 少了地铁的轰鸣声 我甚至都睡不着

translation.en: I guess it comes from growing up with a houseful of brothers.
translation.zh: 也许是因为和兄弟们一屋长大吧

translation.en: I'm not trying to tell you what to do.
translation.zh: 我不是想告诉你该怎么做

translation.en: I'm just saying that if it was my brother, I'd find a way to work it out.
translation.zh: 只是如果是我的兄弟 我会想办法去解决问题

translation.en: But that's just me.
translation.zh: 但说是这么说

translation.en: I got my own issues, you know? Like back at home, with April.
translation.zh: 我也有自己的问题 知道吗？ 就像是和爱普莉尔

translation.en: There's this whole thing about settling down
translation.zh: 安定下来的感觉

translation.en: that makes me miss the old times.
translation.zh: 让我很怀念过去的时光

translation.en: I don't know if I can be the grownup she needs me to be.
translation.zh: 我不知道我能不能成为她需要的那种成年人

translation.en: [sighs] Good talk, Raph.
translation.zh: 跟你聊得很愉快 拉斐

translation.en: [Winters] Arise, my brothers. Arise, dear sister.
translation.zh: 醒来吧 我的兄弟醒来吧 我的姐妹

translation.en: The Stars of Kicaan align.
translation.zh: 基肯星系再度连线

translation.en: All ye generals, wake from your stone slumber.
translation.zh: 所有将军 从石化的沉寂中醒来吧

translation.en: Dude…
translation.zh: 伙计

translation.en: [snoring] Dude.
translation.zh: 伙计

translation.en: Enter.
translation.zh: 进来

translation.en: Kneel, my son.
translation.zh: 跪下吧 孩子

translation.en: I return from my training, master.
translation.zh: 我的修行结束了 师父

translation.en: I was so caught up in my own world, I forgot about everyone else.
translation.zh: 我过分沉浸在自己的世界 忽视了其他所有人

translation.en: I'm sorry I failed.
translation.zh: 很抱歉我失败了

translation.en: [Splinter] On the contrary, my son…
translation.zh: 事实正好相反 孩子

translation.en: now you are much stronger.
translation.zh: 现在的你更加强大

translation.en: Your strength is needed here now.
translation.zh: 这里需要你

translation.en: You owe me no apology, but perhaps you should talk to Raphael.
translation.zh: 你无需向我道歉 但也许你应该跟拉斐尔谈谈

translation.en: Your absence has been particularly difficult for him…
translation.zh: 你不在时他很难过

translation.en: though he'll never admit it.
translation.zh: 虽然他永远不会承认

translation.en: I'm certain things will be back to normal in no time, master.
translation.zh: 我相信他很快会恢复正常 师父

translation.en: Good. Because until you can act as one,
translation.zh: 很好 因为在你们团结一心之前

translation.en: you are forbidden to fight.
translation.zh: 你们都不准出手

translation.en: Yes, Sensei.
translation.zh: 是 师父

translation.en: I have missed you, Leonardo.
translation.zh: 我很想你 里奥纳多

translation.en: I've missed you too, Father.
translation.zh: 我也很想你 师父

translation.en: Raphael… Your brother is home.
translation.zh: 拉斐尔 你的兄弟回家了

translation.en: -Hey. -Hey.
translation.zh: 嗨 嗨

translation.en: Welcome home.
translation.zh: 欢迎回家

translation.en: Yeah. Thanks.
translation.zh: 谢了

translation.en: Well, [yawns] I'm going to bed.
translation.zh: 好吧 我要去睡了

translation.en: [Raphael] Hey, Leo's back. Better go say hello before he leaves again.
translation.zh: 嘿 里奥回来了 最好跟他先打个招呼 免得他又走了

translation.en: -What? Leo! -Hey. [chuckles]
translation.zh: -什么？里奥！-嗨

translation.en: -Hey. -[Michelangelo] Huh, Leo?
translation.zh: -嗨-里奥？

translation.en: -Is that really you? -Yeah.
translation.zh: 真的是你吗？

translation.en: -I'm, like, dreaming, aren't I? -No, Mikey, you're not dreaming.
translation.zh: -是我-我是在做梦吧？ 不 米开 你没做梦

translation.en: Oh, good. I have nightmares about birthday parties.
translation.zh: 那就好 生日派对让我老是做噩梦

translation.en: [Raphael] Okay, Leo, I'll bite. What are we doing up here?
translation.zh: 里奥 我先说吧 到这儿来是要做什么？

translation.en: I told Splinter I'd get this team in shape again.
translation.zh: 我告诉斯普林特我会让这支队伍恢复正常

translation.en: Hey, I've been training. Since you left, my video-game scores have, like, doubled.
translation.zh: 嘿 我的训练可没停 你走后 我的游戏分数翻了一番

translation.en: Right, and while you've been playing games, little brother…
translation.zh: 是啊 在你打游戏的时候

translation.en: this Nightwatcher character's come into the neighborhood
translation.zh: 一位守夜人神兵天降 守护着这座城市

translation.en: like some kind of vigilante showboat. But his days are done.
translation.zh: 守护着这座城市 他已经成为历史了

translation.en: Hey, you went AWOL, Leo…
translation.zh: 里奥 你是去修行了

translation.en: and the Nightwatcher was the only guy to pick up the slack.
translation.zh: 只剩下守夜人在打击罪恶

translation.en: Crime never took a break. You did.
translation.zh: 犯罪势力不会休息 你才会

translation.en: I heard his bike turns into a plane, or, like, a jetpack.
translation.zh: 我听说他的机车变成了飞机 还是喷气背包来着

translation.en: Hey, Don, you're so smart, why don't we have jetpacks?
translation.zh: 多纳 你那么聪明我们怎么没有喷气背包？

translation.en: Yeah. That's good, Mikey. I don't even trust you with a driver's license.
translation.zh: 那是很好 米开 但我都不敢让你开车

translation.en: -Have you seen the way this guy behaves… -[loud roaring]
translation.zh: 你们见过那家伙的样子吗？

translation.en: Oh-ho! Someone's cranky.
translation.zh: 有人在乱发脾气

translation.en: -Okay, jungle boy. Grab a vine. -Raph, wait.
translation.zh: 丛林小子 抓住藤蔓吧 拉斐尔 等等！斯普林特说了我们不能出手

translation.en: Splinter told us not to fight.
translation.zh: 拉斐尔 等等！斯普林特说了我们不能出手

translation.en: [Michelangelo chuckling] "Jungle boy." Good one.
translation.zh: “丛林小子”起得真不错

translation.en: [Leonardo] All right. But remember, we're only up here for training.
translation.zh: 好吧 但要记住这只是为了修行

translation.en: [Michelangelo] You know what I always say, "Train by doing, dude. "
translation.zh: 你知道我会怎么说在实践中修行吧 伙计

translation.en: [Leonardo] Mikey, when have you ever said that?
translation.zh: 米开 你什么时候说过这话？

translation.en: Oof… You smell that? It's like a monkey cage up here.
translation.zh: 闻到了吗？ 上面像是个猴子笼

translation.en: Wow, good news is, there's a bunch of Foot ninjas
translation.zh: 好消息 大脚帮的忍者

translation.en: getting the snot kicked out of them.
translation.zh: 被揍得很惨

translation.en: Bad news is, this thing is gonna run out of bodies soon.
translation.zh: 坏消息 他们就快撑不住了

translation.en: Yeah, so? You think we should help these guys?
translation.zh: 所以呢？你觉得我们要帮他们？

translation.en: I'd rather enjoy the show. What do you say, fearless leader?
translation.zh: 我还是喜欢看戏 怎么说 我们的无畏队长？

translation.en: -We're not… -I say we stop talking.
translation.zh: -我们不能…-我说还是别废话了

translation.en: Yahoo!
translation.zh: 呀呼！

translation.en: [Michelangelo] Come here, fuzzy wuzzy.
translation.zh: 过来啊 毛卷卷

translation.en: [Karai] You.
translation.zh: 你！

translation.en: I think we're getting off on the wrong foot here.
translation.zh: 没必要搞成这样

translation.en: -We're trying to help you. -[Karai] Never.
translation.zh: -我们是想帮你们-不需要

translation.en: Team… [speaking Japanese]
translation.zh: 收队！

translation.en: [Leonardo] Wait, the Shredder's dead.
translation.zh: 等等 施莱德已经死了

translation.en: Who are you working for?
translation.zh: 你们在为谁干活儿？

translation.en: [Raphael] Hey, a little help, O fearless one.
translation.zh: 来帮把手 无畏队长

translation.en: That was too easy.
translation.zh: 轻而易举

translation.en: Like I said, too easy.
translation.zh: 我说了 轻而易举

translation.en: Bad dog.
translation.zh: 坏狗狗！

translation.en: [Donatello grunts] Look at me. Found the elevator.
translation.zh: 看我找到电梯了

translation.en: [Michelangelo] Oh, my shoulder.
translation.zh: 我的肩膀

translation.en: [Donatello] My spleen!
translation.zh: 我的脾脏！

translation.en: [Raphael] This place needed a skylight.
translation.zh: 这地方需要个天窗

translation.en: [Michelangelo] This is why we need jetpacks.
translation.zh: 这就是我们为什么需要喷气背包

translation.en: -[Donatello] Okay, any more bright ideas? -[Michelangelo] How about this?
translation.zh: 好吧 还有其他好主意吗？ 这个怎么样？

translation.en: [Michelangelo] When this is over, I'm totally calling the architect.
translation.zh: 等这事结束我一定要打电话给建筑师

translation.en: [Donatello] Wait a minute. How did something that big just disappear?
translation.zh: 那么个大家伙就这么消失了？

translation.en: -[sirens wailing] -It doesn't… Uh-oh…
translation.zh: 甚至没有… 糟糕！

translation.en: [Michelangelo] Dude, it's the cops.
translation.zh: 警察来了

translation.en: [Leonardo] Raph. Raph!
translation.zh: 拉斐！

translation.en: I give us a ten for style, an eight for skill,
translation.zh: 风格十分 打斗八分

translation.en: and a two for stealth.
translation.zh: 隐身二分

translation.en: What seems to be the problem?
translation.zh: 出什么问题了吗？

translation.en: The problem is that we were hired to merely patrol the city
translation.zh: 问题是我们受雇在城里巡逻

translation.en: and report anything strange to you.
translation.zh: 然后向你报告情况

translation.en: You never said anything about monsters.
translation.zh: 你没提起过会有怪物

translation.en: Now, I'm sorry that your illustrious group have been reduced to hired guns,
translation.zh: 很遗憾你们的杰出团队 如此不堪一击

translation.en: but I believe we made a deal, Karai.
translation.zh: 但我想协议已定 美和

translation.en: And I expect you to honor it.
translation.zh: 我希望你们能遵守它

translation.en: You do understand honor, don't you?
translation.zh: 你们还看重荣誉吧？

translation.en: So how did we fare?
translation.zh: 那么我们的进展如何呢？

translation.en: My, my, my. And what is your name?
translation.zh: 你叫什么名字？

translation.en: Were there any problems, general?
translation.zh: 还有什么问题吗 将军？

translation.en: [Aguila] None, my lord.
translation.zh: 没有 陛下

translation.en: Then show these fools how a true warrior acts.
translation.zh: 那就让这些笨蛋见识一下真正的勇士

translation.en: Keep them on schedule in completing their task.
translation.zh: 让他们按时完成任务

translation.en: [Karai] We do not need any help.
translation.zh: 我们不需要帮助

translation.en: [Winters] Nevertheless, Karai, I trust my family more than I trust you.
translation.zh: 但是美和 比起你们 我更相信我的家人

translation.en: You may be the eyes and ears, but they are the muscle.
translation.zh: 你们可以是耳目 但他们才是实力

translation.en: They will help you gather the remaining twelve of these abominations
translation.zh: 他们会帮你抓到剩下的12个怪物

translation.en: so we can finally see our birthrights fulfilled.
translation.zh: 这样我们就能最终完成使命

translation.en: [snickers] It's going to be quite a party.
translation.zh: 那将是一场盛大派对

translation.en: Dudes, did anyone get the license plate of that thing that hit us last night?
translation.zh: 伙计们 有谁知道昨晚那是什么怪物吗？

translation.en: Ow, my head.
translation.zh: 头疼

translation.en: [Donatello] Okay, that was just weird. I mean, first the Foot,
translation.zh: 真是太奇怪了 先是大脚帮 然后又是大怪物

translation.en: then that hideous monster.
translation.zh: 先是大脚帮 然后又是大怪物

translation.en: Yeah. It looked like your mom, dude. [laughs]
translation.zh: 看起来就像是你老妈 伙计！ （《怪物神话》）

translation.en: Yeah, that would make her your mom too, doofus.
translation.zh: 那也是你老妈 白痴

translation.en: Yeah, whatever.
translation.zh: 无所谓

translation.en: Keep laughing, Mikey. Last night was an embarrassment.
translation.zh: 继续笑吧 米开 昨晚太尴尬了

translation.en: I'll tell you what's embarrassing.
translation.zh: 我来告诉你什么是尴尬

translation.en: You can't even follow a single order.
translation.zh: 你根本不听指挥

translation.en: Oh, how cute. You've been back for five minutes
translation.zh: 真是好笑 你才回来五分钟

translation.en: and now you're schooling us on your master plan?
translation.zh: 就要来训斥我们了？

translation.en: Okay, so this is my fault now, huh, Raph?
translation.zh: 所以是我的错吗 拉斐？

translation.en: I'm the only one that has to be responsible?
translation.zh: 只有我需要负责？

translation.en: Hey, you're the trained master, not me.
translation.zh: 修行大师是你 不是我

translation.en: -Dudes, can it. Here comes Splinter. -[stick tapping]
translation.zh: 别吵了 伙计们 斯普林特来了

translation.en: Oh… Good morning, my sons.
translation.zh: 早上好 孩子们

translation.en: MICHELANGELO, [Donatello] Good morning, Sensei. [Raphael] Sup?
translation.zh: -早上好 师父-吃吗？

translation.en: [Splinter] Every ninja's day should start with a healthy breakfast.
translation.zh: 每个忍者的一天都应该从健康的早餐开始

translation.en: It fills me with pride to see you boys together again.
translation.zh: 看到你们几兄弟又在一起了我感到很骄傲

translation.en: If anyone needs me, I'll be watching my stories.
translation.zh: 我去看电视了 有事找我

translation.en: -[Leonardo] Hothead. -[Raphael] Splinter, Jr.
translation.zh: -鲁莽-装大师

translation.en: Cody is going to break up with Donna. I just know it.
translation.zh: 科迪要和唐娜分手了 我就是知道

translation.en: [newscaster] We interrupt the Gilmore Girls for this special news report.
translation.zh: 现在因突发新闻打断《吉尔莫女孩》的播放

translation.en: Monsters loose in the city?
translation.zh: 怪物在城里游荡？

translation.en: Strange reports are coming in about a construction site incident
translation.zh: 今晚收到了一条关于建筑工地的奇怪报道

translation.en: that sounds like something out of science fiction.
translation.zh: 听起来像是来自科幻小说

translation.en: Boys!
translation.zh: 孩子们！

translation.en: [Splinter] Leonardo, I am most disappointed in you.
translation.zh: 里奥纳多 我对你很失望

translation.en: You are the eldest of your brothers.
translation.zh: 你是兄弟中的老大

translation.en: I was counting on you to bring order to the chaos of this family.
translation.zh: 我还期望着你能重整家庭秩序

translation.en: This is why I have forbidden any surface activity.
translation.zh: 所以我才不让你们出行动

translation.en: We cannot return to the surface to fight evil
translation.zh: 如果再继续内斗

translation.en: if we continue to fight each other.
translation.zh: 我们就不能继续与邪恶作斗争

translation.en: But, Master Splinter, how can I be expected to do so…
translation.zh: 但是斯普林特师父 我要怎么才能…

translation.en: There are no excuses when you are the leader, my student.
translation.zh: 队长不应该找借口

translation.en: We have to go out and find who's responsible for this.
translation.zh: 我们要去查清楚谁是罪魁祸首

translation.en: There ain't no other solution.
translation.zh: 没有别的办法

translation.en: Save the brute-vigilante junk for that Nightwatchman.
translation.zh: 把罪恶留给那个守夜者吧

translation.en: -Nightwatcher. -[Michelangelo] Nightwatch-er. Yeah, whatever.
translation.zh: -是守夜人-随便

translation.en: I'm going out.
translation.zh: 我要出去了

translation.en: [newscaster] Witnesses say there are holes in the floors
translation.zh: 据目击者说地板上出现了个大洞

translation.en: as if something or someone had just blasted straight down through them
translation.zh: 像是被什么东西或是什么人砸出来的

translation.en: leaving authorities scratching their heads.
translation.zh: 关于这一点当局尚无头绪 （市中心突遭大破坏） （守夜人！谁是守夜人）

translation.en: [sighs] Well, at least some people care about justice these days.
translation.zh: （守夜人！谁是守夜人） 现在至少还有人关心正义

translation.en: [Raphael whispering] Hey, Casey.
translation.zh: 凯西！

translation.en: -Raph? -Meet me on the roof, okay?
translation.zh: -拉斐？-楼顶见 好吗？

translation.en: What is it?
translation.zh: 那是什么？

translation.en: The roof. You know what the roof is, don't you?
translation.zh: 楼顶 你知道的 不是吗？

translation.en: Pushy sidekick.
translation.zh: 真是有进取心的伙伴啊

translation.en: [newscaster] We've gotten this image in from an amateur cameraman
translation.zh: 这张照片来自一个业余摄影师

translation.en: and I do stress "amateur."
translation.zh: 强调一下是业余摄影师

translation.en: Casey, come look at this.
translation.zh: 凯西 过来看这个

translation.en: Be safe.
translation.zh: 注意安全

translation.en: What's this all about, Raph?
translation.zh: 怎么了 拉斐？

translation.en: We got bigger things to worry about than I think criminals.
translation.zh: 现在有比罪犯更严重的问题

translation.en: Like what?
translation.zh: 什么？

translation.en: -[Casey] Whoa! -[Raphael] Come on.
translation.zh: 走吧

translation.en: [Casey] I think we lost it.
translation.zh: 追丢了

translation.en: It's gotta be around here somewhere.
translation.zh: 肯定就在这附近

translation.en: [Casey] I don't think so.
translation.zh: 我不这么认为

translation.en: What's going on, Raph?
translation.zh: 这是怎么回事 拉斐？

translation.en: Did I mention we ran into a monster last night?
translation.zh: 我说过我们昨晚遇到怪物了吗？

translation.en: No, you kind of failed to tell me about that one, buddy.
translation.zh: 不 你没告诉我 伙计

translation.en: [Casey] You do know I only have a wooden bat, don't you?
translation.zh: 你知道我只有一根木球棒吧？

translation.en: The Foot? I thought they were history.
translation.zh: 大脚帮？我以为它们已经玩完了

translation.en: And now we got walking statues? You got a plan for those?
translation.zh: 现在又有会走路的雕像了？ 预料到这些了吗？

translation.en: Yeah. Hey, Those are a first for me too.
translation.zh: 我也是第一次见

translation.en: And who knows? These guys might be friendly.
translation.zh: 谁知道呢？这些家伙也许很友善

translation.en: Friendly.
translation.zh: 是啊 友善

translation.en: Wait a second. Those statues look… Oop…
translation.zh: 等下 那些雕像看起来…

translation.en: [Gato] Witnesses.
translation.zh: 有人看到我们了

translation.en: [Raphael] Watch out.
translation.zh: 小心！

translation.en: I don't feel so good.
translation.zh: 我感觉不太妙

translation.en: [Raphael] That can't be good.
translation.zh: 非常不妙

translation.en: [Casey coughs] That's just rude.
translation.zh: 真是粗鲁

translation.en: [gasps] Hey, wait up.
translation.zh: 等等！

translation.en: -Raph? -Come here.
translation.zh: -拉斐？-过来

translation.en: -[Raphael] What, you never heard of smoke pellets? -Warn me next time.
translation.zh: 没听说过烟雾弹吗？ 下次先提醒我

translation.en: [coughs] I got allergies.
translation.zh: 我过敏

translation.en: [Casey] Come on. That's the second mask this week.
translation.zh: 拜托 这周已经坏了两个面具了

translation.en: [Raphael] They'll never find us in here.
translation.zh: 他们不会发现我们

translation.en: Stay with me, now. We'll be out of here soon.
translation.zh: 别昏啊 我们很快就能出去了

translation.en: And I thought Girl Scouts were pushy.
translation.zh: 我还以为是女童子军呢！

translation.en: Some people just can't take a hint.
translation.zh: 有些人就是听不懂暗示

translation.en: [officer] This is the police. You on the roof,
translation.zh: 我们是警察 屋顶上的人听着

translation.en: put your hands behind your…
translation.zh: 把手放在身后…

translation.en: What is that? Tommy, you see this?
translation.zh: 那是什么啊？ 汤米 你看到了吗？

translation.en: Yeah, you better run.
translation.zh: 赶紧跑吧

translation.en: I gotta hand it to you, Raph.
translation.zh: 不得不说 拉斐

translation.en: You sure know how to show a lady a good time.
translation.zh: 你真会找刺激

translation.en: Raph?
translation.zh: 拉斐？

translation.en: Oh, no. I gotta get you someplace safe, pal.
translation.zh: 糟糕 我得带你去个安全的地方 伙计

translation.en: My compliments to the chef.
translation.zh: 赞美大厨

translation.en: [chuckles] Anyone for dessert?
translation.zh: 有人要甜点吗？

translation.en: -No! -Yes.
translation.zh: -不要！-好啊

translation.en: Cowabunga Carl Party Services.
translation.zh: 卡哇邦嘎派对服务

translation.en: Cowabunga, dude.
translation.zh: -卡哇邦嘎 伙计-拉斐受伤了

translation.en: [April] Raph's hurt. You need to get over here right away.
translation.zh: -卡哇邦嘎 伙计-拉斐受伤了 你们需要马上过来

translation.en: Whoa, whoa, whoa, slow down, April.
translation.zh: 你们需要马上过来 慢着 爱普莉尔

translation.en: What happened to Raph?
translation.zh: -拉斐怎么了？-我不知道

translation.en: I don't know. He's unconscious.
translation.zh: -拉斐怎么了？-我不知道 -他昏过去了-我们马上就到

translation.en: [sighs] We'll be right there.
translation.zh: -他昏过去了-我们马上就到

translation.en: Leo! You came back.
translation.zh: 里奥 你回来了

translation.en: Leo!
translation.zh: 里奥！

translation.en: Sorry the reunion isn't under better circumstances.
translation.zh: 抱歉在这种时候重逢

translation.en: Nice pad, kids.
translation.zh: 好地方啊 伙计们

translation.en: Oh, hey, Raph.
translation.zh: 嗨 拉斐

translation.en: Well, his vital signs seem to be okay.
translation.zh: 他的生命体征似乎很稳定

translation.en: Pupil dilation is normal.
translation.zh: 瞳孔扩张正常

translation.en: Some sort of stone.
translation.zh: 某种石头

translation.en: Probably obsidian, I think.
translation.zh: 我想可能是黑曜石

translation.en: Well, is he gonna be all right?
translation.zh: 他会没事吧？

translation.en: You're still here? Go back to your jungle.
translation.zh: 你还在这里？回雨林去吧

translation.en: Well, at least his personality's still intact.
translation.zh: 至少他还是那副德性

translation.en: And there's an engraving on it. Looks South American.
translation.zh: 上面还刻着东西 看起来是南美风格

translation.en: That's your department, April.
translation.zh: 那是你的领域 爱普莉尔

translation.en: Would it help things if I told you
translation.zh: 如果我说是你给温特斯

translation.en: that those statues you collected for that Winters guy
translation.zh: 找的石头雕像们朝我和拉斐

translation.en: were shooting these things at me and Raph?
translation.zh: 射的这玩意儿会有帮助吗？

translation.en: "The Legend of Yaotl."
translation.zh: “优特传奇”

translation.en: It can't be.
translation.zh: 不可能

translation.en: It was just a myth.
translation.zh: 那只是个传说

translation.en: A scary story the locals told kids around a campfire.
translation.zh: 在篝火旁给孩子们讲的恐怖故事

translation.en: Whoa, what are you talking about?
translation.zh: 你在说什么呢？

translation.en: They say 3,000 years ago,
translation.zh: 传说在3000年前

translation.en: some great warrior actually found a portal to another dimension.
translation.zh: 一个强大的战士找到了通往另一个维度的传送门

translation.en: And when the portal opened,
translation.zh: 在那道门开启之后

translation.en: the energy from it gave the warrior eternal life.
translation.zh: 来自另一端的力量给了战士永生

translation.en: But it also turned his generals to stone.
translation.zh: 但这也使他的将军们变成了石头

translation.en: What if this warrior just kept living forever?
translation.zh: 如果这个战士真的长生不死会怎样？

translation.en: He would spend the rest of his days in regret,
translation.zh: 他会陷入永生的悔恨中

translation.en: spending all of his riches and all of his power
translation.zh: 耗尽财富和时间去

translation.en: to find a way to revive his stone generals.
translation.zh: 寻找复活将军们的办法

translation.en: Maybe, just maybe,  he's built a new empire.
translation.zh: 也许他缔造了一个新的帝国

translation.en: But, hey, like I said, it's just a myth.
translation.zh: 但我说过了 这只是个传说

translation.en: Hmm, if you ask me, guys, this has Winters' name
translation.zh: 伙计们 要我说 这和温特斯脱不了干系

translation.en: written all over it.
translation.zh: 这和温特斯脱不了干系

translation.en: How do you figure that, Donnie?
translation.zh: 你怎么知道的 多纳？

translation.en: [both] Yeah.
translation.zh: -就是-就是

translation.en: Because this has Winters' name written all over it.
translation.zh: 因为这玩意儿就来自温特斯企业

translation.en: Now I know who to thank for this shot in the arm.
translation.zh: 现在我知道该找谁报这仇了

translation.en: So where do we find this guy and his stone jokers?
translation.zh: 我们要怎么找到这家伙和他的石头人？

translation.en: We're not going anywhere until we get Splinter's blessing.
translation.zh: 在得到斯普林特的准许前我们哪儿都不去

translation.en: You're going to stand here and quote a rulebook to me
translation.zh: 你要站在这里给我引用

translation.en: that you ain't been following for a year?
translation.zh: 你一年没遵守的规则手册吗？

translation.en: Look, Raph, if you got something you wanna get off your shell, now's the time.
translation.zh: 拉斐 有什么想说的就直说

translation.en: But I'm not gonna stand here and debate Splinter's direct orders with you.
translation.zh: 但我不打算站在这里和你争论斯普林特的指示

translation.en: Fine, then. I quit.
translation.zh: 行 我退出

translation.en: Hey, Raph. Don't do it, man.
translation.zh: 嘿 拉斐 别这样

translation.en: Sometimes, just taking a breather is the best thing to do.
translation.zh: 有时候 最好先休息一下

translation.en: [sighs] Whatever.
translation.zh: 随便了

translation.en: To picking up the pieces.
translation.zh: 敬团聚

translation.en: What is it?
translation.zh: 怎么了？

translation.en: Two creatures remain, my lord.
translation.zh: 只剩下两只怪物了 陛下

translation.en: Well, by all means, then, let's finish it.
translation.zh: 那就尽快解决吧

translation.en: And you will finally be free of your stone prison.
translation.zh: 这样你们就能从雕像中解放出来了

translation.en: But if the curse is broken, we will no longer be immortal.
translation.zh: 但如果诅咒解除 我们也就不再永生不死了

translation.en: Brother, do not question my command.
translation.zh: 兄弟 不要质疑我的命令

translation.en: -[rock and roll music playing] -Yeah! Here we go, now.
translation.zh: 就是这样

translation.en: [April] So what are we looking for?
translation.zh: 所以我们是要找什么？

translation.en: Well, according to these star charts,
translation.zh: 根据这些星象图

translation.en: the portal is set to open directly over Winters Tower
translation.zh: 传送门将在24小时内

translation.en: in the next 24 hours.
translation.zh: 在温特斯高塔上方打开

translation.en: [April] So the legend is right. 3,000 years.
translation.zh: 所以传说是真的 3000年了

translation.en: And when the portal opens,
translation.zh: 那道门打开后

translation.en: we'll lose the city to monsters within hours.
translation.zh: 几小时内这里就会被怪物攻陷

translation.en: Within days, the country.
translation.zh: 几天内攻陷这个国家

translation.en: And within weeks, the world.
translation.zh: 几周内攻陷整个世界

translation.en: Oh, so it's like Halley's Comet, only monsters come out?
translation.zh: 就像哈雷彗星一样只是出来的会是怪物？

translation.en: Um… Yes, I… I guess so.
translation.zh: 我想是这样

translation.en: [chuckles] I'm smart.
translation.zh: 我很聪明

translation.en: I'm okay.
translation.zh: 我没事

translation.en: Why do we need Raph anyway?
translation.zh: 为什么一定需要拉斐呢？

translation.en: It's his temper that always jeopardizes all our missions.
translation.zh: 他的脾气总是影响执行任务

translation.en: Okay, Leo. Whatever you say. Nobody was talking about him.
translation.zh: 里奥 随便你怎么说都行 但没人在说他

translation.en: Leonardo, this team you are so eager to lead is incomplete.
translation.zh: 里奥纳多 你要领导的队伍还不完整

translation.en: You know what you must do.
translation.zh: 你知道应该怎么做

translation.en: Yes, Sensei.
translation.zh: 是 师父

translation.en: [Aguila] Generals, I think our brother has plans to betray us.
translation.zh: 将军们 我觉得我们的兄弟打算背叛我们

translation.en: The 13th monster must not be found.
translation.zh: 不能找到第13只怪物

translation.en: [newscaster] Why don't we take one more call about these monster sightings?
translation.zh: 不如再接入一通关于怪物目击的电话吧？

translation.en: Suffern, New Jersey, you're on.
translation.zh: 新泽西州的萨福恩 请说吧

translation.en: Monster sightings. [scoffs]
translation.zh: 怪物出现了

translation.en: [Dispatcher] Attention, all on-duty officers.
translation.zh: 所有值班人员请注意

translation.en: Report of a disturbance on 32nd.
translation.zh: 32街报告发生骚乱

translation.en: No units available.
translation.zh: 暂无可出警力

translation.en: They're playing my song.
translation.zh: 到我出场了

translation.en: How come the cops haven't shown up?
translation.zh: 警察在哪儿啊？为什么警察总是不见人？

translation.en: Just remember what my analyst said, just go to my happy place.
translation.zh: 记住心理医生说的快想想自己开心的事情

translation.en: Just go to my happy place it's gonna be fine.
translation.zh: 没事的 我很开心

translation.en: Happy place. I'm feeling good. I'm thin.
translation.zh: 没事的 我很开心 我现在很好 我很瘦

translation.en: -Don't get up. -[continues indistinctly]
translation.zh: 我现在很好 我很瘦 不用起来了 我自己就行

translation.en: I'll serve myself.
translation.zh: 不用起来了 我自己就行

translation.en: Oh, look at you. Ain't you cute?
translation.zh: 看看你 多可爱啊 不是吗？

translation.en: You want a butt-kicking, little fella?
translation.zh: 小家伙 你想挨顿揍吗？

translation.en: [baby-talk] Yes, you do. You do.
translation.zh: 当然没错了

translation.en: Come on, I'm gonna drop-kick you to hurty town.
translation.zh: 来吧 我带你去个好地方

translation.en: Come on, little guy.
translation.zh: 走吧 小家伙

translation.en: Get off of me, you little monster!
translation.zh: 快松嘴 小怪物！

translation.en: -You're scratching the helmet. -[cackling]
translation.zh: 你要抓花我的头盔了！

translation.en: Okay, that was different.
translation.zh: 很好 很别致

translation.en: Hey, this thing ain't rustproof! Get off of me!
translation.zh: 嘿 这身装甲不防锈！ 放开我

translation.en: Come on.
translation.zh: 来吧！

translation.en: How about a snack, little fella?
translation.zh: 来点零食吗 小家伙？

translation.en: Catch!
translation.zh: 接住了！

translation.en: Keep on running, you filthy little hermit crab.
translation.zh: 继续跑啊 你这肮脏的小寄居蟹

translation.en: That spicy meatball's on the house.
translation.zh: 辣肉丸子我请了

translation.en: [exclaims] Big guy, please don't hurt me.
translation.zh: 请不要伤害我

translation.en: What? I'm not robbing you, I'm helping you.
translation.zh: 什么？我又不是打劫 我是在救你

translation.en: Okay, whatever you say, sir. Please, I got kids in college.
translation.zh: 你怎么说都行 先生 拜托 我孩子还在读大学

translation.en: Community college.
translation.zh: 社区大学

translation.en: [grunts] Here you go, pal.
translation.zh: 这个给你 伙计 好好保管

translation.en: -Make sure this is safe. -Take everything.
translation.zh: 这个给你 伙计 好好保管 你都拿走吧 我绝不看你

translation.en: I'm not even looking. Go.
translation.zh: 你都拿走吧 我绝不看你

translation.en: [Nightwatcher] Why is it everyone's got such a hard time -believing I am a good guy? -[man] Don't worry about it.
translation.zh: 为什么每个人都不相信我是好人？

translation.en: [Nightwatcher] I just saved your life.
translation.zh: 我刚刚救了你

translation.en: [sighs] This night just keeps getting better and better.
translation.zh: 今晚真是越来越精彩了

translation.en: I want you to know that I appreciate your intentions,
translation.zh: 我想让你知道我很欣赏你的想法

translation.en: but you can't change the world like this.
translation.zh: 但你这样无法改变世界

translation.en: -[muffled] The road you're on is a dead end. -[Nightwatcher] Is he kidding? -I've tried it. -He's lecturing.
translation.zh: -你走的是一条死路-开玩笑吧？他居然在演讲

translation.en: [aloud] So I'm gonna give you one chance
translation.zh: 所以我给你一次机会 离开吧

translation.en: to just walk away and stop this vigilante nonsense.
translation.zh: 所以我给你一次机会 离开吧 别再胡闹了

translation.en: Okay, Leo, time to teach you a lesson.
translation.zh: 好吧 里奥 该我给你上一课了

translation.en: Look, trust me when I tell you, you don't want to do this.
translation.zh: 我是说真的 你不会想要这么做

translation.en: Well, I noticed you got quite a temper.
translation.zh: 我注意到你脾气很暴躁

translation.en: Hey, have you ever done this before?
translation.zh: 嘿 是新手吗？

translation.en: Oh, come on! You call that an attack?
translation.zh: 拜托 这也叫攻击？

translation.en: All right, finally, some excitement.
translation.zh: 很好 终于有点意思了

translation.en: Funny thing about anger…
translation.zh: 愤怒很有趣

translation.en: Let it consume you, and soon enough…
translation.zh: 让它吞噬你 很快

translation.en: …you lose sight of everything.
translation.zh: 你就会失去一切

translation.en: Good night, Dark Prince.
translation.zh: 晚安了 夜之王子

translation.en: Raph?
translation.zh: 拉斐？

translation.en: What?
translation.zh: 搞什么？

translation.en: You are so smug, you know that?
translation.zh: 你太自以为是了 知道吗？

translation.en: You think the world revolves around you, don't you?
translation.zh: 你觉得世界围着你转 是吧？

translation.en: That we couldn't possibly survive
translation.zh: 如果没有了不起的里奥纳多

translation.en: without the mighty and powerful Leonardo
translation.zh: 来引导我们解决问题

translation.en: to guide us through our problems, huh?
translation.zh: 我们就无法生存 对吧？

translation.en: Well, I got a news flash for you.
translation.zh: 那我有个消息要告诉你

translation.en: We got along just fine without you.
translation.zh: 没有你我们也过得很好

translation.en: Oh, and this qualifies as "just fine"?
translation.zh: 这样就是“很好”吗？

translation.en: Dressing up like it's Halloween every night?
translation.zh: 每天晚上都打扮得像在过万圣节？

translation.en: Risking the safety of our family?
translation.zh: 拿我们家人的安全冒险？

translation.en: I mean, come on. What were you thinking?
translation.zh: 我想说你到底在想什么？

translation.en: Don't push it, Leo.
translation.zh: 别太过分了 里奥

translation.en: You can't leave home and come back expecting us to fall in line again
translation.zh: 你不能离开家回来还指望我们

translation.en: like your little soldiers.
translation.zh: 像小士兵一样乖乖听话

translation.en: Hey, I was training,
translation.zh: 嘿 我那是修行

translation.en: training to be a better leader for you.
translation.zh: 成为更好队长的修行那也是也是为了你们

translation.en: Why do you hate me for that? And whoever said I wanted to be led?
translation.zh: -你为什么要因此恨我？-谁说我想被领导？

translation.en: I'm better off calling my own shots.
translation.zh: 我自己做主就很好

translation.en: Now get used to it!
translation.zh: 习惯吧

translation.en: You aren't ready!
translation.zh: 你还没有准备好

translation.en: You're impatient and hot-tempered.
translation.zh: 你没有耐心 脾气又暴躁

translation.en: And more importantly, I'm better than you.
translation.zh: 更重要的是 我比你强

translation.en: Oh, you know something, big brother?
translation.zh: 大哥 你知道吗？

translation.en: I have to disagree with you on that one.
translation.zh: 这一点我不同意

translation.en: Don't do this, Raph.
translation.zh: 别这样 拉斐

translation.en: I'm done taking orders.
translation.zh: 我受够了听人指挥

translation.en: Not human, but clearly not the final monster.
translation.zh: 不是人 也不是最后那只怪物

translation.en: Yaotl won't know the difference.
translation.zh: 优特分不出其中差别

translation.en: By the time our brother discovers this turtle is not the 13th monster,
translation.zh: 等我们的兄弟发现这乌龟不是第13只怪物时

translation.en: it will already be too late.
translation.zh: 已经为时过晚

translation.en: Leo.
translation.zh: 里奥！

translation.en: [shouts] Leo! Hang on!
translation.zh: 里奥 等等！

translation.en: Leo!
translation.zh: 里奥！

translation.en: Leo!
translation.zh: 里奥！

translation.en: [shouting] No!
translation.zh: 不！

translation.en: -[grunts] -Raphael! What is the matter?
translation.zh: 拉斐尔 怎么了？

translation.en: I was out. I was out and I did something.
translation.zh: 我出去之后 做了点事情

translation.en: Something happened and… And then, I… Then, I…
translation.zh: 发生了些事情 然后我…

translation.en: Raphael. Kneel.
translation.zh: 拉斐尔 跪下

translation.en: I did something.
translation.zh: 我做了些事情

translation.en: I did something really stupid, Master Splinter.
translation.zh: 我做了些蠢事情 斯普林特师父

translation.en: Go on.
translation.zh: 继续说吧

translation.en: I know why you chose him now.
translation.zh: 现在我明白你为什么选择他了

translation.en: I know that there's a reason why he's the better son, and I'm not.
translation.zh: 我知道他为什么比我强了

translation.en: Rafael. You always bear the world's problems on your shoulders.
translation.zh: 拉斐尔 你总是背负得太多

translation.en: It is an admirable quality when you are a protector of others.
translation.zh: 在你作为保护者时这是一种令人钦佩的品质

translation.en: But you must realize that while at times
translation.zh: 但你必须要知道

translation.en: you may not be my favorite student,
translation.zh: 你有时也许不是我爱的弟子

translation.en: it does not mean that you are my least favorite son.
translation.zh: 并不意味着 你是我最不喜欢的孩子

translation.en: You are strong, passionate and loyal to a fault.
translation.zh: 你强大 又有热情 还能诚实面对错误

translation.en: These are the merits of a great leader as well,
translation.zh: 这些也是伟大领袖的优点

translation.en: but only when tempered with compassion and humility.
translation.zh: 但前提是要兼具怜悯和谦逊

translation.en: But Master Splinter, I messed up big tonight.
translation.zh: 但是斯普林特师父 今晚我搞砸了

translation.en: I mean big.
translation.zh: 很糟糕

translation.en: They took him.
translation.zh: 他们带走了他

translation.en: Leonardo.
translation.zh: 带走了里奥纳多

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 是的

translation.en: Then the time for hiding is over.
translation.zh: 那我们不必再躲藏了

translation.en: We must return to the surface to take back what is ours.
translation.zh: 我们必须回到地面夺回属于我们的东西

translation.en: By your wish, Father.
translation.zh: 遵命 师父

translation.en: Long have we been in hiding.
translation.zh: 我们已经躲藏了很久

translation.en: Perhaps too long.
translation.zh: 也许已经太久了

translation.en: Well, what do we do now?
translation.zh: 我们现在要怎么做？

translation.en: I'll tell you what we're gonna do.
translation.zh: 我来告诉你们要做什么

translation.en: We're gonna rescue our brother,
translation.zh: 我们要去救我们的兄弟

translation.en: and then we're gonna save New York City.
translation.zh: 然后拯救纽约

translation.en: I got it on my last trip to Japan.
translation.zh: 我上次去日本的时候买的你喜欢吗？

translation.en: -You like it? -Oh, yeah.
translation.zh: 我上次去日本的时候买的你喜欢吗？ 喜欢

translation.en: No way.
translation.zh: 不可能！

translation.en: You can't go trick-or-treating without your mask.
translation.zh: 去玩不给糖就捣蛋可不能不戴面具

translation.en: Oh, babe. Thanks.
translation.zh: 谢谢你 亲爱的

translation.en: As ordered, no one gets into the tower.
translation.zh: 按照命令 任何人不得进入塔楼

translation.en: No one interferes. No one bears witness.
translation.zh: 任何人不得打扰 消灭所有目击者

translation.en: You've got to be kidding me.
translation.zh: 开玩笑吧

translation.en: [Casey] Uh, [laughs sheepishly] Cowabunga, dude!
translation.zh: 卡哇邦嘎 伙计

translation.en: Uh, I'm here for little Maxie's 13th birthday party?
translation.zh: 我来参加小马克西的13岁生日派对

translation.en: [Karai] Leave. Now.
translation.zh: 现在就离开

translation.en: [Casey] Oh, you don't understand, lady. I got…
translation.zh: 你不明白 小姐 我有…

translation.en: [Winters] At last, after 3,000 years,
translation.zh: 终于到了今天 3000年了

translation.en: the time is finally at hand.
translation.zh: 这一刻终于来临

translation.en: What? What have you done?
translation.zh: 什么？你们做了什么？

translation.en: Your time for giving orders is over.
translation.zh: 你发号施令的时代结束了

translation.en: [Winters] You don't understand.
translation.zh: 你们根本不明白

translation.en: I want to send these creatures back to where they came from.
translation.zh: 我想把这些生物送回它们原来的地方

translation.en: To undo the damage that was done so many years ago.
translation.zh: 消除多年前铸就的大错

translation.en: Time had done nothing but made you weak.
translation.zh: 时间只是让你变得软弱了

translation.en: We have our own plans.
translation.zh: 我们有自己的计划

translation.en: Immortality is a curse, brother.
translation.zh: 永生是诅咒 兄弟

translation.en: Trust me. I've lived long enough to know.
translation.zh: 相信我 我活了这么久所以我知道

translation.en: We have to find that 13th monster.
translation.zh: 我们必须找到第13只怪物

translation.en: -It's time to end it. -No!
translation.zh: -是时候结束一切了-不！

translation.en: Our time is just beginning.
translation.zh: 我们的时代才刚刚开始

translation.en: -[Raphael] A little help, Don! -[Donatello] I'm on it!
translation.zh: -帮把手 多纳-我来了

translation.en: [Michelangelo] Heads up, dudes!
translation.zh: 小心 伙计们！

translation.en: -[ninjas groaning in pain] -[ninja yells]
translation.zh: 正中红心！

translation.en: [April] Guys! Front door's open. Now!
translation.zh: 伙计们 前门开着 就是现在

translation.en: Two minutes for high sticking.
translation.zh: 两分钟后开始攀登

translation.en: Dudes, that rocked! Let's go again.
translation.zh: 伙计们 太酷了！再来一次吧

translation.en: Dudes, what do we do? I'm working on it.
translation.zh: -我们现在怎么办？-我正在想呢

translation.en: You break it, you buy it.
translation.zh: 弄坏就得赔偿

translation.en: Yeah! All right!
translation.zh: 太好了！

translation.en: -[Casey] All right! Nice. -[Michelangelo laughs]
translation.zh: 真不错

translation.en: -Nice work, Jones. -Oh! [chuckles nervously] I have my moments.
translation.zh: 干得好 琼斯 这就是我的高光时刻

translation.en: Whoa! Check it out.
translation.zh: 快看这个

translation.en: That would be the swirling vortex to another world, I assume.
translation.zh: 我猜那是通往另一个世界的漩涡

translation.en: [Casey] Cool. I want one.
translation.zh: 真不错 我也想要

translation.en: Leo? Is that you?
translation.zh: 里奥 是你吗？

translation.en: -[thuds] -Sorry! Wrong cage.
translation.zh: 抱歉 搞错了

translation.en: [Raphael] Leo! I got him!
translation.zh: 里奥 他在这里

translation.en: [Donatello] Out of the way, please.
translation.zh: 大家让开点

translation.en: Hey, buddy. Come on, man. Up we go.
translation.zh: 嘿 兄弟 我们走了

translation.en: -[Leonardo groans] -[Raphael] There you go.
translation.zh: 来吧

translation.en: You're gonna need these if you're gonna lead us out of here.
translation.zh: 要带我们离开这里 你会需要这些

translation.en: I'm gonna need you, too.
translation.zh: 我也需要你

translation.en: -[April] Winters? -[Michelangelo] Looks more like fall, get it?
translation.zh: 温特斯 看起来像是摔下来了 是吧？

translation.en: Mikey, remember our talk.
translation.zh: 米开 记住我们是怎么说的

translation.en: Looks like someone got to him before us.
translation.zh: 看起来有人比我们先动手

translation.en: [April] Is he dead?
translation.zh: 他死了吗？

translation.en: Not so immortal, huh, dudes?
translation.zh: 看来不是真的永生 是吧？

translation.en: [April] Your time's run out, Winters.
translation.zh: 没时间了 温特斯

translation.en: Miss O'Neil.
translation.zh: 奥尼尔小姐

translation.en: I must have hit my head pretty hard,
translation.zh: 这次头一定撞得不轻

translation.en: I'm seeing giant turtles.
translation.zh: 我居然看见了四只乌龟

translation.en: We know what you're up to, Winters.
translation.zh: 我们知道你想做什么 温特斯

translation.en: We know about the portal and we think that it's time
translation.zh: 我们知道关于传送门的事 我想你该送那些怪物回家了

translation.en: you sent all these monsters home.
translation.zh: 我想你该送那些怪物回家了

translation.en: [Winters] I couldn't agree with you more.
translation.zh: 说得没错

translation.en: It is time to put an end
translation.zh: 是时候结束我对自己

translation.en: to the curse that I have brought upon myself and this world.
translation.zh: 是时候结束我对自己 和世界带来的诅咒了

translation.en: That's what this is about, Miss O'Neil. Penance.
translation.zh: 奥尼尔小姐 这就是为了忏悔

translation.en: I must return all 13 beasts or our curse will continue.
translation.zh: 我必须把13只怪物都送回去否则我们的诅咒还会继续

translation.en: And that is a torment I can no longer bear.
translation.zh: 而我已经无力承受这折磨

translation.en: [Aguila] Then you should be put out of your misery.
translation.zh: 那你应该从痛苦中解脱了

translation.en: I think we walked in on a family feud, guys.
translation.zh: 伙计们 我想我们碰上家庭纠纷了

translation.en: The time has come to reopen the portal
translation.zh: 是时候重新打开传送门

translation.en: and rain destruction upon the Earth.
translation.zh: 将毁灭之雨洒向地球

translation.en: Nothing will stand in our way
translation.zh: 只要军队在手

translation.en: when we have an army at our command.
translation.zh: 我们就无人能挡

translation.en: -My brothers. I… -We are no brothers to you!
translation.zh: 兄弟们 我… 我们不是你的兄弟！

translation.en: With one monster still free, the curse will never be broken!
translation.zh: 只要还有一只怪物在外面 诅咒就永远不会解除

translation.en: We shall finish what we began all those years ago.
translation.zh: 我们将完成多年前就开始的使命

translation.en: And we will finally have our victory.
translation.zh: 我们终将取得胜利

translation.en: Join us. Join us, Foot Clan.
translation.zh: 加入我们吧 大脚帮

translation.en: Swear your allegiance to us and no harm will befall you.
translation.zh: 向我们宣誓效忠 你们将无坚不摧

translation.en: [scoffs] The Foot Ninja is not without honor.
translation.zh: 大脚帮的忍者效忠于荣誉

translation.en: We work for Winters, not you.
translation.zh: 我们是为温特斯工作 不是你们

translation.en: Okay, what does that mean?
translation.zh: 那是什么意思？

translation.en: It means we're going to help you.
translation.zh: 意思是我们会帮助你们

translation.en: My ninja will find the last monster,
translation.zh: 我的忍者会找到最后一只怪物

translation.en: and you will bring it back here.
translation.zh: 而你要把它带回这里

translation.en: Hurry, we don't have much time.
translation.zh: 快点 时间不多了

translation.en: Hey. I got shotgun!
translation.zh: 嘿 我有猎枪！

translation.en: [Aguila] Forget about them.
translation.zh: 别指望他们了

translation.en: By the time they return,
translation.zh: 等他们回来

translation.en: the portal will already be closed…
translation.zh: 传送门已经关闭了

translation.en: with you inside it.
translation.zh: 而你将身在另一端

translation.en: I hate to see brothers fight like this.
translation.zh: 我讨厌看到兄弟决裂

translation.en: Unless it's together.
translation.zh: 是时候并肩战斗了

translation.en: Hate to rain on your parade, pal,
translation.zh: 真不想扫你们的兴

translation.en: but we thought we'd even the odds.
translation.zh: 但我们胜算差不多

translation.en: We're going to enjoy this.
translation.zh: 这一定会很有意思

translation.en: [Splinter speaks Japanese] [in English]If you please.
translation.zh: 不 请等一下

translation.en: They can defeat them. They are a team.
translation.zh: 他们能够取得胜利 他们很团结

translation.en: [Winters] Let's hope so.
translation.zh: 希望如此 因为如果不行的话

translation.en: Because if not, Aguila will use the portal
translation.zh: 希望如此 因为如果不行的话 阿奎拉会利用传送门引出邪恶军团

translation.en: to draw forth an army of evil and the world will be lost.
translation.zh: 阿奎拉会利用传送门引出邪恶军团 这世界就完了

translation.en: More beasts.
translation.zh: 会有更多的怪物

translation.en: Let's send them back where they belong.
translation.zh: 把它们送回该去的地方吧

translation.en: -[groans] -[Donatello] Temper, temper.
translation.zh: 冷静

translation.en: Come to daddy.
translation.zh: 到爸爸这儿来

translation.en: [Raphael] Thing about you immortal stone guys is,
translation.zh: 你们这些不死的石头人

translation.en: you know, you're immortal and made of stone.
translation.zh: 你们是不死 也是石头做的

translation.en: I sound like Mikey.
translation.zh: 这像是米开说的话

translation.en: You fight well. You should join us.
translation.zh: 身手不错 你应该加入我们

translation.en: No, thanks, I'm good.
translation.zh: 不了 谢谢 我对现在很满意

translation.en: [Michelangelo] These guys really don't die. Sensei, are you all right?
translation.zh: 这些家伙真的死不掉 师父 你还好吗？

translation.en: [chuckling] We must do this more often. Hi-yah!
translation.zh: 我们应该加强锻炼

translation.en: I still got it.
translation.zh: 我还宝刀未老呢

translation.en: They'd better hurry with that last monster.
translation.zh: 他们最好快点抓到最后那只怪物

translation.en: I'm sure my man Casey's got it all under control.
translation.zh: 我确信一切尽在凯西掌握

translation.en: That's what I'm afraid of.
translation.zh: 我就担心这个

translation.en: Can't this piece of junk go any faster?
translation.zh: 这玩意不能再快点吗？

translation.en: -You wanna drive? -I would, as a matter of fact.
translation.zh: -你来开？-事实上我可以

translation.en: You would think they would be more concerned about the 13th monster.
translation.zh: 还以为他们会更关注第13只怪物

translation.en: Boys, we must finish this now!
translation.zh: 是时候结束了

translation.en: So did we win?
translation.zh: 我们赢了吗？

translation.en: [chuckling] Foolish creatures.
translation.zh: 愚蠢的生物

translation.en: We are immortals made of stone!
translation.zh: 我们是石头身体的永生存在

translation.en: Without the final monster to break our curse,
translation.zh: 除非最后那只怪物来打破诅咒

translation.en: we will never be stopped!
translation.zh: 否则我们是不可战胜的

translation.en: [Casey] Special delivery!
translation.zh: 快递来了！

translation.en: -[Winters] Look out! -[turtles groan]
translation.zh: 小心！

translation.en: [Michelangelo] So did we win now?
translation.zh: 我们现在赢了吗？

translation.en: [Donatello] Yeah, I think we did.
translation.zh: 我想是的

translation.en: -[all cheering] -All right! Yeah!
translation.zh: -我们赢了！-好极了

translation.en: -That's what I'm talking about! -[grunts]
translation.zh: 我就说吧

translation.en: -[wheels squeaking] -[Casey] Nice parallel parking.
translation.zh: 停车技术不错

translation.en: Next time, I'm driving.
translation.zh: 下一次我来开车

translation.en: -[thudding] -[Casey] Hey! Watch the hair.
translation.zh: 嘿！当心头发

translation.en: [Raphael scoffs] Typical. We do all the work,
translation.zh: 经典 活儿都是我们干的

translation.en: he gets all the thanks.
translation.zh: 赏都他领了

translation.en: You are every bit the warriors I was informed you were.
translation.zh: 你们果然和我听说的一样

translation.en: You have passed.
translation.zh: 你们合格了

translation.en: Savor your victory tonight.
translation.zh: 享受今晚的胜利吧

translation.en: For soon, we will have further business together.
translation.zh: 很快我们就将再次合作

translation.en: The kind that involves familiar faces from your past.
translation.zh: 也许会有熟悉的旧面孔

translation.en: She doesn't mean…
translation.zh: 她不是说…

translation.en: Looks like you picked a good time to come home.
translation.zh: 看来你选了个好时机回家

translation.en: Thanks… for bringing me back.
translation.zh: 谢谢你带我回来

translation.en: Winters?
translation.zh: 温特斯？

translation.en: I'm never usually that happy to be in pain.
translation.zh: 痛苦一般不会让我那么开心

translation.en: [Donatello] He's happy because he's mortal again, Mikey.
translation.zh: 他是高兴自己不再不死了 米开

translation.en: April. I've had my eye on you for a long time.
translation.zh: 爱普莉尔 我已经注意你很久了

translation.en: I knew it.
translation.zh: 我就知道

translation.en: I've always known that you'd be the one to help me find my way home.
translation.zh: 我就知道你可以 帮我找到回家的路

translation.en: And thank you… brothers.
translation.zh: 也谢谢你们

translation.en: You've made a very old man very, very happy.
translation.zh: 你们让一个老人感到很幸福

translation.en: So, um, what happens now?
translation.zh: 所以现在要做什么？

translation.en: Okay. Just a little bit creepy.
translation.zh: 有点诡异

translation.en: [sneezes] Oh, gross! I think he's in my…
translation.zh: 恶心！ 我想他在我的鼻子里

translation.en: My… My… [sneezes]
translation.zh: 我想他在我的鼻子里

translation.en: Oh, gross!
translation.zh: 真恶心！

translation.en: Somebody give me a hankie.
translation.zh: 谁给我条手帕

translation.en: Oh. Oh! Now he's in my mouth.
translation.zh: 他进我嘴里了

translation.en: [groans] Tastes awful!
translation.zh: 味道真糟糕

translation.en: [Raphael] You got room for one more?
translation.zh: 还有空位吗？

translation.en: [Michelangelo] Uh, can I get rid of this, too?
translation.zh: 我能把这个也放那儿吗？

translation.en: [Raphael] We live together. We train together. We fight together.
translation.zh: 我们一起生活 一起训练 一起战斗

translation.en: We stand for good, together.
translation.zh: 我们一起为正义挺身而出

translation.en: We are ninjas.
translation.zh: 我们是忍者

translation.en: We strike hard,
translation.zh: 我们打击罪恶 捍卫正义 守护和平

translation.en: defend, protect, and fade into the night.
translation.zh: 我们打击罪恶 捍卫正义 守护和平 然后消失在夜色中

translation.en: And there ain't no bad guy  or monster gonna ever change that.
translation.zh: 任何敌人和怪物都无法阻止我们

translation.en: That's what's important.
translation.zh: 这才是重点

translation.en: And that's why we'll always be brothers.
translation.zh: 所以我们永远是兄弟

translation.en: Oh, I love being a turtle.
translation.zh: 做乌龟真是太好了

translation.en: Yo momma's breath smells like rusty pennies!
translation.zh: -闻起来像是坏掉的土豆-拜托

translation.en: Yo momma's breath smells like salamander stew.
translation.zh: 你妈闻起来像蝾螈

translation.en: Yo momma drink country club out of the bottle. A baby bottle.
translation.zh: 你妈带婴儿奶瓶 去乡村俱乐部

translation.en: Yo momma smells diseased!
translation.zh: 你妈闻起来很恶心

translation.en: Yo momma got leprosy in gold Nikes.
translation.zh: 你妈有麻风病

translation.en: Yo momma smells like a problem! Ha! Boo!
translation.zh: 等下 你妈闻起来有问题

translation.en: Yo momma got six elbows and she do the robot "Boo."
translation.zh: 你妈有六个胳膊肘 她和机器人上床

translation.en: Yo momma smells like the inside of this recording booth!
translation.zh: 你妈闻起来 是录音棚里的味道
